channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: Polkadot Magazine ISSUE #00
item.description: Polkadot Magazine ISSUE #00 Milano Design Week 2011 21 modules per spread; pocket size: easy to use and compact. Our goal is to have a pocket format that might be easy to use and not bulky, but without sacrificing the content. The Polkadot Mag can be folded like a map and this allows maximum handiness but also pleasure in reading.
item.content:encoded: Polkadot Magazine ISSUE #00 Milano Design Week 2011 21 modules per spread; pocket size: easy to use and compact. Our goal is to have a pocket format that might be easy to use and not bulky, but without sacrificing the content. The Polkadot Mag can be folded like a map and this allows maximum handiness but also pleasure in reading.

item.title: Octave
item.description: Octave has been created with the intention of fusing together the graphical elements of written musical composition with the English alphabet. My passion for illustration and typography made me naturally lean towards lettering, while music is a very important element in my creative process. While reading the newspaper or a book, a designer might unconsciously stop acknowledging the content due to the very natureof the letters. Often in observing the fonts used in books I've read, I've thought that for those of us who work with these fonts, theyare analogous to the notes on a score in the eyes of a musician. They represent the graphic structure that builds the music by which emotions, ideas and feeling are communicated. In the same way, letters are the graphic structure with which texts are composed, making them tools to communicate emotions, ideas and feelings in their own right.
item.content:encoded: Octave has been created with the intention of fusing together the graphical elements of written musical composition with the English alphabet. My passion for illustration and typography made me naturally lean towards lettering, while music is a very important element in my creative process. While reading the newspaper or a book, a designer might unconsciously stop acknowledging the content due to the very natureof the letters. Often in observing the fonts used in books I've read, I've thought that for those of us who work with these fonts, theyare analogous to the notes on a score in the eyes of a musician. They represent the graphic structure that builds the music by which emotions, ideas and feeling are communicated. In the same way, letters are the graphic structure with which texts are composed, making them tools to communicate emotions, ideas and feelings in their own right.

item.title: BARK Chair - Prototyped
item.description: BARK is a set of chairs that came from the observation of a trees section, as a way of expressing the unique relationship between the outside and the inside. What you can immediately see and what truly lays within.
item.content:encoded: BARK is a set of chairs that came from the observation of a trees section, as a way of expressing the unique relationship between the outside and the inside. What you can immediately see and what truly lays within.

item.title: X Games 2011
item.description: I was commissioned by ESPN to create key art for the youth marketing for the 2011 Summer and WInter X-Games. The commission was to create sports based thematic scenes, extra characters, type hits, logo treatments and patterns that could then be used by their various suppliers to create products and advertising.
item.content:encoded: I was commissioned by ESPN to create key art for the youth marketing for the 2011 Summer and WInter X-Games. The commission was to create sports based thematic scenes, extra characters, type hits, logo treatments and patterns that could then be used by their various suppliers to create products and advertising.
